name: RadioMountLebanon
0:
”Alexa, open Radio Mount Lebanon”
”Alexa, launch Radio Mount Lebanon”
”Alexa, play Radio Mount Lebanon”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio mount lebanon
des:
We are the first and only FM broadcast station in the USA broadcasting in the Arabic language from our studios in Southern California. We play the 80's 90's and today's hits.

To enable our skill, say "Alexa, enable Mount Lebanon skill."

At anytime, you can stop the stream by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
